General.Name: Harvia Oyj
General.Description: Harvia Oyj, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and distributes traditional, steam, and infrared saunas. It provides electric heaters, sauna controls, and wood burning heaters; bathroom and indoor saunas; backyard paradise and sauna benches; doors and glass products; hot tubs; infrared cabins and infrared heating devices; steam rooms, SPA modules, and steam generators; and water purifying solutions. The company also offers accessories, such as pails and ladles, scents, textiles, indicators, sound and lighting products, stones, maintenance products, neck and back rests, and other accessories, as well as safety solutions. It operates in Finland, other European countries, North America, Germany, Russia, Scandinavia, and internationally. The company was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Muurame, Finland.
